dict.acceptation: 应受报答；应得报酬；应得赔偿；应受惩罚；

sent.orig: Those who work deserve to eat; those who do not work deserve to starve.
sent.trans: 劳动者该得食，不劳者该挨饿。

sent.orig: So mean, petty, or paltry as to deserve contempt.
sent.trans: 卑鄙的''。'下贱'。''的、微不足道的或没有价值以至应该轻蔑的。

sent.orig: So FEM is deserve extending in designing the tower.
sent.trans: 值得在索道塔架设计中推广。

sent.orig: Student: I don't think I deserve an absolute zero.
sent.trans: 学生：我以为我不应该患上零分。
